title: Didnâ€™t receive BE from runes refund
body: Pretty much the title, I opened my loot but still did not receive my BE

replies.body: Double check that you've played a match in order to complete the BE conversion mission. After that you'll get some orbs in your loot that will have all of the BE!

Good evening,

The BE from your runes refund is given in the form of a mission. You'll need to complete one matchmade game in-order to complete this mission. Once you've done that be sure to check your loot for your BE capsules.

Very Respectfully,
Desonance
